item.content:encoded:
Do it your self lash extensions? Yes please! It is easy, convenient, you have the ability to do unlimited designs, and it is safe for your lashes!

item.content:encoded:
First of it’s kind in Japan! The silicon tip will fuse your natural lashes and extensions together without damaging the root of lashes.

item.title: DIY HOME Lash Extension System Medium (C Curl 10.11.12)
item.dc:creator: lucialashandbrow
item.description:
*Lucia DIY home lash is easy to apply and damage free lash system.* How to apply? The application is simple […]

The post DIY HOME Lash Extension System Medium (C Curl 10.11.12) first appeared on LUCIA LASH/BROW.
item.content:encoded:
*Lucia DIY home lash is easy to apply and damage free lash system.*

How to apply?

The application is simple and easy. Apply special lash bond chose to your lash line and attach Lucia lash underneath your lashes and “fuse” them gently.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

How long do the last?

Last about up tp 5days if you keep them completely dry .If you want to keep them last longer, apply additional glue to your lose lashes everyday and fuse them 2-3/day.

___________________________________________________________________________________________

Do I use a lash extension glue for this application?

No, the DIY bong is a copolymer based latex free. It’s completely safe to apply close to your eyes by yourself.

How do I remove my eye make without disturbing my lashes?

If you wearing heavy eye makeup, lift eyelid and use Q tips to wipe around eyes carefully.

____________________________________________________________________________________________

What is the glue made of?

Latex Free formula that is gentler on your skin. Long lasting staying power.

Gluten free, sulfate free and BPA free. Cruelty free and Vegan.

The glue dries clear for an invisible hold.

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

How can I remove the home lashes.

Wash your face with makeup remover. Apply it on your eyelid and massage gently. It will melt away in 1min.

Can I use any lash bond?

Unfortunately, other bonds do not work for this DIY system. Please purchase the

_________________________________________________________________________________________________

How can I keep them dry?

Please use face wipes to clean your face.

________________________________________________________________________________________

The post DIY HOME Lash Extension System Medium (C Curl 10.11.12) first appeared on LUCIA LASH/BROW.
